step.framework.ws.handler
Class ExceptionThrowerHandler

java.lang.Object
  step.framework.ws.handler.ExceptionThrowerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.xml.ws.handler.Handler<javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext>, javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPHandler<javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext>
public class ExceptionThrowerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPHandler<javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext>

This JAX-WS Handler can be configured to throw a runtime exception type in any of the SOAP message handling methods. It is useful for testing proper error handling in the handler processing chain.

The throw method and runtime exception classname are specified in the "exception-thrower-handler.properties" file.
